about_the_game:
is a Magic Tower (fixed-value strategy RPG) game with additional elements such as Skills and Equipment, in which players take on the role of different Braves to go to the Magic-Tower and defeat the Demon King to "save" their world!

Game Features

- Play Gutsy Swordsman for free! After succeeding in the High Challenge, you will also be rewarded with free unlockable [paid DLC] to play other characters!
- 6 different characters, learn a variety of skills in the Tower
- 53 levels of carefully designed towers, a structure that changes depending on the character, and different character plots to uncover the nature of the tower as the game unfolds
- Use different characters to explore the hidden mystery of the tower, use different weapons and equipment, and create your own way through.
- The carefully balanced 3 basic difficulties + 100 additional difficulty challenges allow both casual and hardcore players to enjoy the strategy of this game.
- Each character has more than 2 hours of single pass time to start your strategy feast.
- After raiding the tower, challenge the extremely difficult mode, maybe you are the next number one in the world in the leaderboard.
- Redrawing of the classic magic tower monsters, more than 60 kinds of enemies, master the enemy skills, defeat the lord and the last demon king, to create their own adventure!

Don't miss out on such a fun free game. What are you waiting for?
